description.value:
This small, handheld medical device looks similar to a soldering iron. You can use it to end the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.v9RNVTqyTyaPchvd]{Bleeding} condition for a target within reach as a standard action, melting the flesh on a cellular level to stanch further blood loss. Unfortunately, the target takes 1 fire damage as a result. A target with any form of fire resistance canâ€™t benefit from a scorch suture.

A scorch suture requires only one hand to operate. It uses a battery, and each use consumes 2 charges.

Capacity  20; Usage  2
